titleInfo.title: Letter from L-C P, Government of India to Sir Lewis Pelly, India

mods.abstract: Letter regarding the re-opening of frontier passes and trade, and explaining that the sudden decision to re-open them caught many traders unprepared.A postscript to the letter refers to a brief report the author wrote about Surat the previous year and notes that the information contained within it about the district of Surat and its factions and parties may be of interest to Pelly.The signature on the letter is illegible, however the postscript has been initialled as L-C P.
